'''2.11.24''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on October 10, 2023.</onlyinclude>

== Changes ==
* Re-added Minecraft Live tab for Minecraft Live 2023.

== Fixes ==
* Some layout and UI layering fixes.
* UI enhancements & bug fixes for Minecraft Live.
* {{bug|MCL-23643}} - "Light Blue Glazed Terracotta" is incorrectly referred to as "Glazed Terracotta" in the installation selection icons.
* {{bug|MCL-23667}} - UnsupportedPlatformMessage displays outdated information on Linux and Mac.
* {{bug|MCL-23707}} - Split infinitive in Community Standards string creates ambiguity.
